ValidationMessage.name: CasPrmFillInAllValues
ValidationMessage.comment: All fields need to be filled with values.

ValidationMessage.name: CasPrmDateFromGTDateThru
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: Please enter a Date Thru that is greater or equal Date From.

ValidationMessage.name: CasClbCannotCreateContractWhileSubstituted
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: For the selected day, an active substitution is running for you for the selected customer. You are not allowed to create contracts during the substitution time frame, if you are the substituted user.
ValidationMessage.comment: validates if the current user is substituted and a substitution is running
